loginpage.title: Login
loginpage.intro: To access our website, register with your email and password. If you have already registered, please login.

location.introduction: Some more information about the city where we are getting married, the location of the wedding and what to visit
location.cerimonia: Both the wedding ceremony and the reception will take place at....

RSVP.title: R.S.V.P.
RSVP.headerExplain: Please complete the form below to let us know if you can make it to the wedding.
RSVP.thanks: Thanks for your RSVP. Please let us know if there are any changes at least two weeks before the wedding.
RSVP.fieldAllergies: Do you have any allergies or dietary preferences?
